topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Applying Patches to KVM Region Servers

body.p: If there are any patches required or optional to be installed into the KVM region of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, you can use the Horizon interface to apply the patches.
Note: This feature applies only to servers in regionone.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Inventory tab. Click the Hosts table.
Click Upload Patches to locate the patch file and import the patch file into the Horizon interface and click Upload Patch.

Select the patch in the Patch List and click Apply Patches.
The Patches page is updated to report the patch to be in the Partial-Apply state..

In the Hosts list, for controller0, select Swact Host from the Edit Hosts menu to transfer active services to the standby controller.
Wait for the procedure to be completed.
For controller0, select Install Patches from the Edit Hosts menu.

When the patch in installed, for controller0, select Swact Host from the Edit Hosts menu to transfer active services back to controller0.
Wait for the procedure to be completed.

For controller1, select Install Patches from the Edit Hosts menu.
On the Patches table, the patch is now in the Applied state.
